Package uo.ri.cws.application.business.supply

Interface SuppliesCrudService

public interface SuppliesCrudService

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String add​(SupplyDto dto)
    Registers a new supply in the system for the indicated provider and spare part
    void delete​(java.lang.String nif, java.lang.String code)
    Removes from the system the supply uniquely indicated by the nif and code (a supply can be removed with no other considerations)
    java.util.Optional<SupplyDto> findByNifAndCode​(java.lang.String nif, java.lang.String code)  
    java.util.List<SupplyDto> findByProviderNif​(java.lang.String nif)  
    java.util.List<SupplyDto> findBySparePartCode​(java.lang.String code)  
    void update​(SupplyDto dto)
    Updates the supply with the new data from the incoming dto

  • Method Details

    • add

      java.lang.String add​(SupplyDto dto) throws BusinessException
      Registers a new supply in the system for the indicated provider and spare part
      Parameters:
      dto -
      Returns:
      the id of the new registered supply
      Throws:
      BusinessException - in case of: - there already exist a supply for the provider and the spare part - the delivery term or the price are negative - does not exist the provider - does not exist the spare part

    • delete

      void delete​(java.lang.String nif, java.lang.String code) throws BusinessException
      Removes from the system the supply uniquely indicated by the nif and code (a supply can be removed with no other considerations)
      Parameters:
      providers - nif
      spare - part code
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if the indicated supply does not exist

    • update

      void update​(SupplyDto dto) throws BusinessException
      Updates the supply with the new data from the incoming dto
      Parameters:
      dto -
      Throws:
      BusinessException - in case of: - it does not exist a supply for the provider and the spare part - the delivery term or the price are negative

    • findByNifAndCode

      java.util.Optional<SupplyDto> findByNifAndCode​(java.lang.String nif, java.lang.String code) throws BusinessException
      Parameters:
      nif -
      code -
      Returns:
      the supply dto uniquely identified by the provider nif and spare part code or Optional.empty() if does not exist
      Throws:
      BusinessException - DOES NOT

    • findByProviderNif

      java.util.List<SupplyDto> findByProviderNif​(java.lang.String nif) throws BusinessException
      Parameters:
      provider - nif
      Returns:
      the list (might be empty) of supply dto served by the provider identified by nif
      Throws:
      BusinessException - DOES NOT

    • findBySparePartCode

      java.util.List<SupplyDto> findBySparePartCode​(java.lang.String code) throws BusinessException
      Parameters:
      spare - part code
      Returns:
      the list (might be empty) of supply dto identified by the spare part code
      Throws:
      BusinessException - DOES NOT
